name: The Time Travelling Tales
description: The Time Travelling Tales is a text based adventure game set in the mystical land of Renegoth. There is a deadly zombie disease plaguing the land and your the last hope for humanity. Your a scientist that builds a time machine that can either go to the past or the future. The past was once filled with magic and monsters that could hold the cure or you could go to the future where maybe science holds the answers. Where you go is up to you. This multiple choice adventure game has many unique story lines with many endings. The choices you make are up to you in the Time Travelling Tales!
